name: Kaze Kami
description:
Rate us or leave a comment on our ludum dare!
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/kaze-kami

Winds of God.

WASD To control Wind

  • Green = Grass: Burnable tile
  • Brown = Dirt: Turns into green tile
  • Gray = Ash: Burnt tile (turns into brown)
  • Blue = Water: Non flammable tile
